00021     template <typename T> class _xmat4
00022     {
00023     private:
00024         // Data
00025         _xvec4<T> value[4];
00026 
00027     public:
00028         //int _size() const {return 4;}
00029 
00030     public:
00031         // Constructor
00032             _xmat4();
00033         explicit _xmat4(const T x);
00034         explicit _xmat4(const T x0, const T y0, const T z0, const T w0,
00035                         const T x1, const T y1, const T z1, const T w1,
00036                         const T x2, const T y2, const T z2, const T w2,
00037                         const T x3, const T y3, const T z3, const T w3);
00038             explicit _xmat4(const _xvec4<T> & v0, 
00039                         const _xvec4<T> & v1,
00040                         const _xvec4<T> & v2,
00041                         const _xvec4<T> & v3);
00042         //explicit _xmat4(const T* a);
00043         // GL_GTX_euler_angles
00044         //explicit _xmat4(const _xvec3<T> & angle);
00045 
00046         // Conversion
00047         //explicit _xmat4(const glm::_xquat<T> & q);
00048 
00049         // Accesses
00050         _xvec4<T>& operator[](int i) {return value[i];}
00051         const _xvec4<T> & operator[](int i) const {return value[i];}
00052         operator T*() {return &value[0][0];}
00053             operator const T*() const {return &value[0][0];}
00054 
00055         // Operators
00056         _xmat4<T>& operator= (const _xmat4<T>& m);

00064             _xmat4<T> operator/ (const T s) const;
00065             _xmat4<T>& operator/= (const T s);

00075     };
00076 
00077     template <typename T> _xmat4<T> operator* (const T s, const _xmat4<T> & m)
00078     {
00079         return m * s;
00080     }
00081 
00082     template <typename T> _xvec4<T> operator* (const _xvec4<T> & v, const _xmat4<T> & m)
00083     {
00084         _xmat3<T> Transpose;
00085         Transpose[0][0] = m[0][0];
00086         Transpose[1][0] = m[0][1];
00087         Transpose[2][0] = m[0][2];
00088         Transpose[3][0] = m[0][3];
00089 
00090         Transpose[0][1] = m[1][0];
00091         Transpose[1][1] = m[1][1];
00092         Transpose[2][1] = m[1][2];
00093         Transpose[3][1] = m[1][3];
00094 
00095         Transpose[0][2] = m[2][0];
00096         Transpose[1][2] = m[2][1];
00097         Transpose[2][2] = m[2][2];
00098         Transpose[3][2] = m[2][3];
00099 
00100         Transpose[0][3] = m[3][0];
00101         Transpose[1][3] = m[3][1];
00102         Transpose[2][3] = m[3][2];
00103         Transpose[3][3] = m[3][3];
00104         return Transpose * v;
00105     }
00106 } //namespace glm
